H0.text: itai-itai disease was a form of poisoning associated with ingestion of. Mercury

H1.text: itai-itai disease was a form of poisoning associated with ingestion of. Arsenic

H2.text: itai-itai disease was a form of poisoning associated with ingestion of. Lead

H3.text: itai-itai disease was a form of poisoning associated with ingestion of. Cadmium

A4.text: Itai-itai disease was caused by cadmium poisoning due to mining in Toyama Prefecture.

A5.text: Initially, it was expected to be lead poisoning due to the lead mining upstream.
